maml:description.maml:para: Build a new Bootstrap report based on an HTML template
Inserts the specified title, description, and body into the HTML report template
Title of the report (displayed at the top)
Description of the report (displayed below the Title)
Body of the report (tables, list groups, etc.)
The path to the HTML report template that includes the Boostrap CSS
Body of the report (tables, list groups, etc.)
Description of the report (displayed below the Title)
The path to the HTML report template that includes the Boostrap CSS
Title of the report (displayed at the top)

dev:type.maml:name: Outputs a complete HTML report as a string

maml:alert.maml:para: Author: Jeremy La Camera Last Updated: 11/6/2016

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- EXAMPLE 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code: New-BootstrapReport -Title 'ReportTitle' -Description 'This is the report description' -Body 'This is the body of the report'
